New Records: Suryakumar Yadav got to his hundred off 45 balls, breaking KL Rahul's record of 46 balls
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 runs vs Sri Lanka in Rajkot
Yadav got to his half-century off 26 balls
Yadav was involved in a partnership of 113 runs along with Shubman Gill
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar is also one of the two Indian batters to score three or more hundreds in T20Is
Rohit Sharma leads with four hundreds for India in T20Is
Glenn Maxwell and Colin Munro have three T20I hundreds each
Miscellaneous Highlights: The likes of Wasim Jaffer, Ian Bishop, Kamran Akmal, Unmukt Chand, Aakash Chopra and many others praised Yadav for his performance
Others: Hyundai Creta EV revealed with 473km driving range
TRENDING TOPICS: Border-Gavaskar Trophy, New Year 2025, Delhi Election
